Welcome to the Hardware Kits section of the Machine Learning Systems textbook. These hands-on laboratories bridge theory with practice through embedded ML development on real hardware.

- [Getting Started](contents/labs.qmd) - Introduction to embedded ML education

- [IDE Setup](contents/ide_setup.qmd) - Development environment configuration

## Supported Platforms

### Arduino Nicla Vision
Professional-grade vision and audio development with dual-core processing.

### Seeed XIAO ESP32S3
Compact, affordable platform with camera and WiFi capabilities.

### Grove Vision AI V2
No-code entry point with visual programming support.

### Raspberry Pi
Full Linux environment for advanced deployments including LLMs and VLMs.

## Part of the MLSysBook Ecosystem

These laboratories complement the [Machine Learning Systems textbook](https://mlsysbook.ai) and work alongside [TinyTorch](https://mlsysbook.ai/tinytorch) for a complete learning experience.
